Package stork.feather.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BellHandler.Always<T>
    A handler for Bells that always runs on ring.
    BellHandler.Done<T>
    A handler for Bells that ring successfully.
    BellHandler.Fail<T>
    A handler for Bells that ring fail.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnonymousResource
    A base class for Resources with no Session.
    BellHandler
    A set of functional interfaces for Bell promises that take Java 8 lambdas and method references.
    BellLoop
    An experimental Bell-driven loop.
    Crawler<R extends Resource<?,R>>
    A Crawler crawls and operates on Resource trees.
    HexDumpResource
    A destination Resource which prints a hexadecimal representation of incoming data to an OutputStream or, by default, to System.out.
    Intern<O>
    A object internalization utility based on soft references.
    LocalResource
    A Resource produced by a LocalSession.
    LocalSession
    A Session capable of interacting with the local file system.
    Pipes
    A utility class for creating Pipes, Taps, and Sinks for various purposes.
    Pipes.AggregatorSink
    A Sink which receives and parses an Ad.
    Progress
    A utility for measuring the progress of some operation.
    Resources
    A utility class for creating anonymous Resources.
    ThreadBell<T>
    A Bell which starts a Thread to generate its value.
    Throughput
    A class for keeping track of instantaneous throughput.
    Time
    A timer utility.
